questionTitle: Marjorie was ________ better than her sister at tennis.
She lives near to me and I often speak to her on my ________ to work.
The noise of the traffic prevented me from ________ to sleep.
The horse 'Red Rum' is famous for ________ the Grand National race three times.
Before we start the lesson, I'd like to ________ what we did yesterday.
Well, I think it's time we ________ on our way.
Would you ________ looking after the baby for me while I'm out?
It seems that the world record for this event is almost impossible to ________.
They're old customers of ours. We've been ________ with them for many years.
She applied for training as a pilot, but they turned her ________ because of her poor eyesight.
Patricia wasn't accustomed ________ by coach.
He's left his book at home; he's always so ________.
Newly-________ coins always look clean and shining.
Sorry I'm late. I had to go to the library to ________ some books.
It was such a hot day ________ the surface of the road began to melt.
Mrs Maudsley always ________ out in a crowd because she wore such large hats.
Please apply ________ the secretary for information.
Though the concert had been enjoyable, it was overly ________ and the three encores seemed ________.
A skillful ________, the Dean adopted a posture of patience and ________ toward the protestors, rather than rejecting their demands outright.
Could you give me a rough ________ of what the job might cost?
